The '''Sugar-Frosted Slime''' is a quest item that is used in the [[Equilibrium]] quest. It is made out of [[Tasty Slime Condensate]] and [[Extra-Sweet Sweet Flower]] (note this is not an actual [[food]] recipe in-game) from around where the Traveler meets [[Meng Dan]]. The container for it is obtained from [[Xingxi]].
